comments:
I20060131-1200

If you start eclipse with a project that references a missing team provider other than CVS, the Team provider for CVS fails to initialize correctly.  Having one incorrectly configured provider should not stop the others working.

Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-in: "org.eclipse.ui.workbench".

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 124998 ***

This is not a duplicate of 124998, although it is very similar.  In my case, it is the repository that is null, not the provider.  The project was pointing to a repository provider that was not installed.
Yeah, I guess your right. I only looked at the code in HEAD and saw that this was also fixed so I marked it a duplicate. It turns out it was fixed by a subsequent change.
